snippet: SugarString ran afoul of the public when The DailyDot reported in October that an editor recruiting journalists was warning them that the site would forbid reporting on “spying and net neutrality.”
lead_paragraph: SugarString ran afoul of the public when The DailyDot reported in October that an editor recruiting journalists was warning them that the site would forbid reporting on “spying and net neutrality.”

headline.main: Verizon Shuts Down SugarString, Site That Had Drawn Journalistic Criticism
